SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USP_ANNOTATIONE607DCD82D214918A0445597DF53A403_EDIT
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_ANNOTATIONE607DCD82D214918A0445597DF53A403_EDIT ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @DISPLAYNOTIFICATIONWINDOW bit, @APPLYTOCODE tinyint, @VALIDUNTIL datetime, @APPUSERIDSETREGISTERID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null ) as begin set nocount off
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
update dbo.[ANNOTATIONE607DCD82D214918A0445597DF53A403] set DISPLAYNOTIFICATIONWINDOW = @DISPLAYNOTIFICATIONWINDOW, APPLYTOCODE = @APPLYTOCODE, VALIDUNTIL = @VALIDUNTIL, APPUSERIDSETREGISTERID = @APPUSERIDSETREGISTERID, CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE where ID = @ID end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch end
